alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central El Paso County through 145 PM MDT... At 118 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Mission Valley, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East El Paso, Central El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Horizon City, Fort Bliss, Socorro, Sparks, Biggs Field and Fort Bliss Northeast. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 24 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
